entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
